MAP_MARKER.SELLER_SALE_ITEMS_FIELD: Dzidzakpɔtɔ ɖe dze be dzidzakpɔtɔ na

SECTIONS.CONTENT_1: Gbegbɔgblɔwo le Map of Pi, le aɖe me ŋkɔna do ƒe gblɔm na xɔ si Map of Pi gblɔwo le Pi Community. Ameŋunyatakakawo ŋuti ðoɖo keke wo wo dze ɖeŋu gblɔm na xɔ si wo dzi dze ŋutɔ le mobile app lɔme.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_1_1: Ŋutɔ le wo dze nuwo xɔ si ɖe le ŋutɔ, ŋutɔ le wo email adrɛs, ŋutɔ le wo dze kple wo dzidzakpɔtɔ lɔme.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_1_2: Le wo dze nuwo xɔ si wo device, enye wo device type, operating system, kple unique device identifiers.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_2_1: Sellers dze le platform lɔme gblɔxɔ le ŋutɔ dzidzakpɔtɔ, dzidzakpɔtɔ le wo dze, wo location, kple wo dzidzakpɔtɔ ɖoɖo.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_2_2: Dzidzakpɔtɔ ŋuti me ŋutɔ ŋutɔ ŋutɔ na me.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_1_1: Xɔ le wo ŋutɔ xɔ si ɖe kple gblɔm le Map of Pi app, ɖe user kple seller functionalities lɔme.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_2_1: Wo dze gblɔm xɔ si wo contact information me hã wo nuwo, notification, kple vuvuwo dzidzakpɔtɔ le Map of Pi app lɔme.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_3_1: Wɔe le dze kple kpɔkpɔ ɖe ŋutɔ wo dze na ɖe wo ɖeɖe, features, kple functionality le app lɔme.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_1_1: User ŋutɔ le wo dze be dzidzakpɔtɔ ɖe gblɔɖe kple wo dzidzakpɔtɔ wo dze be dzidzakpɔtɔ lɔme.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_2_1: Ŋutɔ le wo ŋutɔ be dzidzakpɔtɔ ɖe third-party service providers lɔme gblɔɖe le app functionality, analytics, kple payment processing.
SECTIONS.HEADER_5: Vovɔ lɔ le wo ŋutɔ ɖe
SECTIONS.CONTENT_5_1: Wɔe le industry-standard vovɔ lɔ le wo ŋutɔ. Ewe, nú ɖe wò bliboɖe, wò elektroniklɔ si vovɔ seseke na aɖe bliboɖe.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_6_1: Wo ka xɔ le wo account information kple app settings lɔme. Wo ɖeɖe le wo Map of Pi account me ŋutɔ le wo Pi Network account kple kple xɔ le ŋutɔ le wo Map of Pi data ŋutɔ lɔme. Wo ka hã le promotional communications kple.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_7_1: Wo le wo Ameŋunyatakakawo ŋuti ðoɖo be dzidzakpɔtɔ lɔme. Ɖe le dzɔm le wo website kple ɖe app lɔme.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_8_1: Ne wo ka ŋutɔ le wo dzidzakpɔtɔ lɔmewo aɖe le ameŋunyatakakawo ŋuti ðoɖo, ŋutɔ le wo xɔ si email adrɛs lɔme.

SECTIONS.CONTENT_1_1: Le akɔ ƒe Nudɔ Map of Pi, ɖe ameŋunyatakakawo ŋuti Ðoɖo, agbe Map of Pi ɖe ƒe Pi Network. Megbetɔwo ɖe ƒe si le ɖe be agbe yi kple ŋuti ɖo ɖo ɖe akɔ ƒe akɔwo aŋutsɔ le ameŋunyatakakawo ŋuti Ðoɖo.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_1: Megbetɔwo ɖe ƒe Nudɔ Map of Pi ɖo ɖo me nyate nɔ siwo kple mele.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_2: Akɔ ƒe Nudɔ Map of Pi ɖe enye ɖe tsoɖzɔ le agbe ɖe la siwo nuwo, eye la mɛlo akɔ ame me nɔ, be mɛlɔkpɔkpɔ, fia meko dze, eye me yia.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_3: Ɖo ƒe Nudɔ Map of Pi, o nye o siɖi le ɖe be piɔnɔwo aɖe Pi Network kple ɖo.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_1: Nudɔ Map of Pi, siwo kple nu, akɔ siwo kple mɔkpɔkpɔ, eye kple nɔkɔtɔwo kple dze me tsoƒe, gake le Map of Pi kple melewo lawo kple nɔ.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_1: Map of Pi aɖe wò kpe gbe siwo dze, eye siwoɖeka nɔ, nu, mɛkpɔkpɔ, eye aɖeka me ɖeka kple nɔwo eye siwo ɖeka le Nudɔ Map of Pi.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_5_1: Megbetɔwo ɖe ƒe aloɖaɖa kple keke Mɔ Map of Pi kple me ɖeɖea ɖeka kple nyate, nɔ, mɛkpɔkpɔ, eye kple ɖe aloɖaɖa kple nɔ mekplewo (keke la me ɖeɖeaɖea siwo be ɖeɖeaɖea ɖeka kple nɔme).
SECTIONS.CONTENT_6_1: Nudɔ ƒe ƒe alokpe sia kple gake le gbe siwo aŋutsɔ lawo kple nɔ ɖe Nɛtɔɖo kple wia bebe le Ingland kple Wales be amegbetɔwo ɖe kpe.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_7_1: Mee aɖe alo alo ƒe alokpe sia kple ɖe alo ŋkpe alo alo aŋutsɔ tso le ɖe.

SHARED.CONFIRM_DIALOG: Ɖe si kple alo ɖe be si ɖe ɖe ɖe siaɖiwo. Wò be wo kple agbe?

PHOTO.IMAGE_DROP_UPLOAD_MESSAGE: Kpɔ siwo be ɖe ƒe ɣe ŋutɔ foto alo tɔkɔ
PHOTO.SUPPORTS_FILE_MESSAGE: Ɖe vɔ: PNG, JPG, JPEG, WEBP

VALIDATION.SELECT_EMOJI_EXPRESSION: Mɛdɔ dzi emoji la ƒe agblɔɖeɖe
